abstract: GMAC Financial Services, the U.S. auto finance company, agreed to sell its factoring business unit to Wells Fargo, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter.
snippet: GMAC Financial Services, the U.S. auto finance company, agreed to sell its factoring business unit to Wells Fargo, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter.
lead_paragraph: GMAC Financial Services, the U.S. auto finance company, agreed to sell its factoring business unit to Wells Fargo, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: GMAC Said to Plan Sale of Unit to Wells Fargo

abstract: Wells Fargo said Wednesday that it had agreed to buy GMAC’s North American factoring business. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
snippet: Wells Fargo said Wednesday that it had agreed to buy GMAC’s North American factoring business. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo said on Wednesday that it had agreed to buy GMAC‘s North American factoring business. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

headline.main: Wells Fargo to Buy GMAC’s Factoring Business
